title: THURSDAY 4/15 - NO "CLOWNEY-ING" AROUND IN CLEVELAND
itunes:title: THURSDAY 4/15 - NO "CLOWNEY-ING" AROUND IN CLEVELAND
description:
Pass rusher Jadeveon Clowney (0:40) signing a 1-year deal with the Browns on Wednesday and talked about teaming up with Myles Garrett. The NFL offseason schedule is out (0:06) while Giovani Bernard (1:28) talks about playing with Tom Brady in Tampa. Keanu Neal (1:48) will have to adjust to playing a new position for the Cowboys...and speaking Dallas, former Cowboy Aldon Smith (2:05) visits the Seahawks, Plus, Justin Fields (2:25) held his second pro day workout

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
